Description: Filter set in neck of handled jug sherd pierced with bold six-pointed star design. Body heavy, friable, fritty, pinkish-buff, glaze semi-opaque bluish with/vertical manganese and turquoise stripes.
Findspot: Excavated/Findspot: Fustat, MLA register: "From the official excavations at Fostat; selected by Mr Somers Clarke, F.S.A."
